original_title: Why Does A Good God Allow Bad Things?
overview: One of the most asked questions is why a loving God allowsdeath and suffering. The heart of the Creator is revealed as Gary Bates persuasively unfolds the often overlooked issue in today's evolution-creation culture wars - the vital 'big picture' of the Gospel. Many hearts and minds were changed after hearing Gary explain the Gospel message with a powerful, yet compassionate approach.
tagline: The Biblical Response to Death and Suffering
title: Why Does A Good God Allow Bad Things?
